page_content: The page discusses legal aspects and data protection related to the use of the Kanton Thurgau website.
The page provides information on Lohnausweis and offers a software program, eLohnausweis SSK, for creating Lohnausweis forms.
The page provides information on the judicial offices and courts responsible for the Birwinken area.
The page outlines the planning and implementation of pre-school language promotion, mentioning the use of Schulverwaltungssoftware (Edis-SVS) for data collection.
The page provides various guides and forms for agricultural data collection, including instructions for structure data collection on the internet.
The page offers a download for eFisc2012, a tax declaration software, and provides an installation guide.
The page describes a course on how to make your own colors, focusing on the composition of paint and its application on a wooden box.
